channel.title: Need help with A Auto Restater
channel.description: I have windows xp and It says It cant find or recgonize tskill. So it doesnt work wtf?

item.title: Need help with A Auto Restater
item.dc:creator: @OMG_its_NICK OMG its NICK
item.description:
@OMG_its_NICK wrote:

It was voule okay let me try,

that code didnt work.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 07, 2008, 05:47:50 PM[/size][hr][codes]Voule Auto restart
‘tskill’ is not recognized as an internal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Restarting servar [/codes]

Thats the error I get when tring to use Voule Auto restarter

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with A Auto Restater

item.title: Need help with A Auto Restater
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

try dis

:end
@Title YOUR NAME Auto-Restarter
@echo YOUR NAME Auto-Restarter is Running…
@PING -n 900 YOUR SERVER IP >nul
@echo Closing server
@tskill java
@PING -n 3 YOUR SERVER IP>nul
@echo Starting up server
@PING -n 3 YOUR SERVER IP >nul
@start .\runserver.bat
@echo .
@Goto end

Just change the number 900 to how every many seconds you want it to let server run then it will shut it down and restart it. MAKE SURE you put in your server ip

Read full topic
